    • Uses of Bar in it.polimi.group03.engine

      Methods in it.polimi.group03.engine that return Bar 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private Bar GameBrain.getBestDefensiveBar(GameEngine engine, Player me)
      If the algorithm wasn't able to find a proper bar to move and defeats the opponents' beads, nor place at least one of his/her beads on a cover slot, the next move will be a defensive one, which means that will retrieve a new position that will cover most of are own beads with both bars without committing suicide.
      private Bar GameBrain.getRandomBar(GameEngine engine, Player me, java.util.List<Bar> bars)
      Murphy Law, if it isn't possible to find a proper bar to move, will return the first bar allowed.
      Bar GameBrain.move(GameEngine engine)
      Retrieve a bar with the new position selected as the preferred movement.
      Methods in it.polimi.group03.engine that return types with arguments of type Bar 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private java.util.List<Bar> GameBrain.getBarsOfBeads(GameEngine engine, java.util.List<Bead> beads)
      Retrieves all the bars in which the beads provided are present.
      Methods in it.polimi.group03.engine with parameters of type Bar 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private java.util.List<Bead> GameBrain.getBeadsOnBar(java.util.List<Bead> beads, Bar bar)
      Retrieves all the beads present on the selected bar.
      private int GameBrain.getDefeatsOnBar(GameEngine engine, java.util.List<Bead> beadsOnBar, Bar bar, int level)
      Retrieves the number of fallen beads in the selected bar after "performing" the movement if the level is 0, if no, will retrieve a "strategic" count based on how many RED or BLUE (depending on the level) slots are discovered by moving the selected bar.
      private boolean GameBrain.isConsecutiveBarMoveValid(GameEngine engine, Player player, Bar selectedBar)
      This method checks the movement that a player tries to do when there are only two players left in the game, in order to do it validates the selected bar against the the list of moved bars, and checks if this particular player has two consecutive moves, if so compares the bar with those two moves, if it is the same bar that the one that was moved before returns a negative response, if not returns a positive response.
      private boolean GameBrain.isSelectedBarMoveValid(GameEngine engine, Player player, Bar selectedBar)
      This method checks that the bar selected by the player has not been slid by any of his/her opponents in the previous turn.
      private void GameEngine.refreshMovedBarsInRound(Player player, Bar bar)
      This method adds the bar moved by the player to the list of bars that have been moved in the round Game.movedBarsByOpponents It also deletes the second previous move of the user in order to store just what it requires to fulfill the game rules.
      private StatusMessage GameValidator.validateBarPositionMove(Bar selectedBar, BarPosition targetPosition)
      This method checks the intended movement of the bar with respect of the final position.
      private StatusMessage GameValidator.validateConsecutiveBarMove(Player player, Bar selectedBar)
      This method checks the movement that a player tries to do when there are only two players left in the game, in order to do it validates the selected bar against the the list of moved bars, and checks if this particular player has two consecutive moves, if so compares the bar with those two moves, if it is the same bar that the one that was moved before returns a negative response, if not returns a positive response.
      StatusMessage GameValidator.validateMove(Bar selectedBar, BarPosition targetPosition, Player currentPlayer)
      This method checks whether the movement a player is trying to do complies with the rules established for the game.
      private StatusMessage GameValidator.validateSelectedBarMove(Player player, Bar selectedBar)
      This method checks that the bar selected by the player has not been slid by any of his/her opponents in the previous turn.
      Method parameters in it.polimi.group03.engine with type arguments of type Bar
